definition: to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

sentences.english: Xizorboarded his advanced combat vessel, the Virago, andescaped to the skyhook.
sentences.chinese: 西做乘坐着他先進的戰鬥艦潑婦號逃向他的太空梭。

sentences.english: The US announced recently that two'littoral assault' ships will be based permanently at Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 美國最近宣佈將把兩艘濱海戰鬥艦永久部署在新加坡。
